top10_tweets_like: You might notice that https://t.co/0mhQs57TDp has a new look ‚Äî I'm working on a new bookdown theme (available soon). Please let me know if you see anything that could be improved! #rstats

odbc 1.3.0 is now on CRAN!üéâ

odbc allows you to connect to many different databases efficiently from #rstats

This release avoids the infamous 'Invalid Descriptor' error in SQL Server, so you no longer need worry about column order.

See https://t.co/asZXCn7T34 for more info! https://t.co/BDLDC2hzH9

Behold! A practical introduction to using instrumental variables with #rstats, including manual 2SLS and automatic 2SLS with iv_robust(), as well as weak instruments tests and Anderson-Rubin confidence intervals, all with video! https://t.co/GtO48FVzjc https://t.co/QFYeReT0iC

Another piece based on floating point error. The height of the lines plots the computed value of (exp(ln(x)) - x)/x for values of x between .00001 and .05. Positive values are in pink, negative in gold. The faint white lines are cases when the computed value is exactly 0. #rstats https://t.co/JyO08wolxJ
